meanings.sent1: After eating too much, he chunders all over the floor.
meanings.sent2: She chunders every time she gets motion sickness.
meanings.sent3: The baby chunders during the car ride, making a mess.
meanings.sent4: The overflowing river chunders down the mountainside.
meanings.sent5: The roller coaster made him chunders uncontrollably.

meanings.sent1: The smell of chunders filled the room after the party.
meanings.sent2: She couldn't stand the sight of the chunders on the sidewalk.
meanings.sent3: The dog found a pile of chunders and started sniffing curiously.
meanings.sent4: The garbage can was like a container of old chunders.
meanings.sent5: The chunders on the carpet looked like a messy accident.
